name: R4B-PractitionerRole-R5-PractitionerRole
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B PractitionerRole into FHIR R5

element.display: Roles/organizations the practitioner is associated with

target.display: Roles/organizations the practitioner is associated with
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole`

element.display: Whether this practitioner role record is in active use

target.display: Whether this practitioner role record is in active use
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.active` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.active`

element.display: Description of availability exceptions
Times the Service Site is available
Always available? e.g. 24 hour service
Closing time of day (ignored if allDay = true)
Opening time of day (ignored if allDay = true)
mon | tue | wed | thu | fri | sat | sun
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Roles which this practitioner may perform

target.display: Roles which this practitioner may perform
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.code`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.contained`

element.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the practitioner with this role

target.display: Endpoints for interacting with the practitioner in this role
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.endpoint`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PractitionerRole.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: The list of healthcare services that this worker provides for this role's Organization/Location(s)

target.display: Healthcare services provided for this role's Organization/Location(s)
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.healthcareService` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.healthcareService`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.id`

element.display: Business Identifiers that are specific to a role/location

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PractitionerRole.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: The location(s) at which this practitioner provides care

target.display: Location(s) where the practitioner provides care
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.location` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.location`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PractitionerRole.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Not available during this time due to provided reason
Reason presented to the user explaining why time not available
Service not available from this date
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Organization where the roles are available

target.display: Organization where the roles are available
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.organization` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.organization`

element.display: The period during which the practitioner is authorized to perform in these role(s)

target.display: The period during which the practitioner is authorized to perform in these role(s)
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.period`

element.display: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organization

target.display: Practitioner that provides services for the organization
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.practitioner` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.practitioner`

element.display: Specific specialty of the practitioner

target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.specialty` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.specialty`

element.display: Contact details that are specific to the role/location/service
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `PractitionerRole.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PractitionerRole.text`
